thread.title: Behind The Design of the Popular Nike Special Forces Air Force 1
thread.title_full: Behind The Design of the Popular Nike Special Forces Air Force 1

author: David Fischer
title: Behind The Design of the Popular Nike Special Forces Air Force 1
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
The recently launched Nike Special Forces Air Force 1 is one of the most popular new silhouettes of the sportswear giant in the lifestyle segment. Essentially footwear designer Ben Kirschner fused the SFB Boot and the iconic Air Force 1 in the release, with the outcome being the perfect winter boot version of the court classic. The first design of the boot actually came with a Crepe sole. We hope that that version will actually see the light of day in the future. Metal eyelets and hooks have been added, a tongue pocket and the boldest design element is without any doubt the interwoven collar strap, which has an important function, while also being a fantastic design element.
